duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble supplies and equipment needed for surgical procedures.
Prepare sterile instrument table for procedures.
Assist in positioning patients and preparing patient’s skin for surgery.
Maintain sterile techniques and actively monitor situations that could lead to breaches in sterile technique.
Assist the surgical team during procedures by passing instruments, sponges, and sutures.
Assist in monitoring the patient during procedures.
Gather equipment for cleaning and sterilization after procedures.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved surgical technologist program.
BLS Required (American Heart or American Red Cross)
Hospital based Surgical Tech experience preferred.
Ability to perform work that requires frequent standing, bending, reaching, squatting, kneeling, moving, lifting of patients and/or equipment up to 50 pounds
